ministry: Ministry of Women and Child Development
description: Cash incentive scheme for pregnant women and lactating mothers to compensate for wage loss and promote proper health, nutrition, and immunization.

eligibility.income_limit: Annual family income ≤ ₹8 lakhs (for general category)
other_conditions: First living child: Any gender - eligible for ₹5,000
Second living child: Only if girl child - eligible for ₹6,000 (one-time)
Excludes women in regular employment with Central/State Government/PSUs receiving maternity benefits
Must apply within 730 days from LMP (first child) or 460 days from birth (third installment)
Miscarriage/stillbirth: Can claim remaining installments in future pregnancy
Infant mortality: Not eligible if all installments already received

required_documents: MCP Card (Mother and Child Protection Card)
Bank/Post Office passbook (DBT enabled, joint accounts not accepted)
benefits: First child: ₹5,000 total (₹1,000 + ₹2,000 + ₹2,000 in three installments)
OR First child: ₹5,000 total (₹3,000 + ₹2,000 in two installments - state variation)
Convergence with JSY: Additional benefits up to ₹6,000 total
Direct Benefit Transfer to woman's bank account
Over 4 crore beneficiaries paid > ₹20,000 crore since 2017

steps: Visit official portal https://pmmvy.wcd.gov.in or nearest Anganwadi Centre
Register pregnancy within 150 days from Last Menstrual Period
Submit Form 1-A with Aadhaar, MCP card, bank details
Receive first installment (₹1,000/₹3,000) after pregnancy registration and one ANC
Claim second installment (₹2,000) post 180 days of LMP with Form 1-B
Claim third installment (₹2,000) after birth registration and complete primary immunization
For second girl child: One-time ₹6,000 after birth registration and immunization
